</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



:::note
Returns new tokens with metadata, created at timestamp and markets.
Refer to [Token API doc](/docs/token-api) for more information.
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"How many records to output in the result","required":false,"schema":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64"},"example":"10"},{"name":"offset","in":"query","description":"The offset into the result set. Used in conjunction with\n`limit` to page through the data.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","nullable":true,"default":0},"example":"20"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
